summary: An amnesiac French diplomat is blackmailed for crimes that he committed before he lost his memory.
cast: William Powell|Hedy Lamarr|Claire Trevor|Basil Rathbone|Margaret Wycherly|Felix Bressart|Sig Ruman|H.B. Warner|Philip Merivale|Enrique Acosta|George Barrows|Robert Bradford|Francis X. title: Crossroads
